metadata.name: Legendary Rikka #1
metadata.description: The Supernova collection represents the elite core of AM and the epitome of prestige. As exclusive VIPs in the ecosystem, holders are continually granted the highest level of benefits and rights befitting their privileged status. Supernovas will always command the highest priority for rewards, compared to any future collections. Summoned into the digital realm of OPUS, the Supernovas spearhead the battle against the evil artificial intelligence C.A.N.O.N as champions of the resistance. Together, they herald the dawn of a new era.
